description: This course focuses on the wonderous actions of the human body. Students learn how
several vital body functions occur subconsciously, such as the rhythmic beating of the heart or
the digestion of nutrients after a meal. Topics include how the brain works, how muscles contract,
and how kidneys produce urine, and  the remarkable biology associated with reproduction. Students
use this understanding to elucidate diseases such as diabetes and hypertension. Students attend
class plus one two-hour laboratory per week. Offered annually.
